title: Airport Terminal Small Caps Font Signage
content:
Maybe this isn't the right forum, but within the last year or so, someone on the Type ID Forum posted a photo of signage at an airport terminal that turned out to be a small caps font. I searched for small cap, airport, terminal and combinations of of those words and came up empty.

Can anyone point me to the original post? Thanks!
author: Renaissance Man

comments.content: The only post I can think of is this one: [http://www.typophile.com/node/41686](http://web.archive.org/web/20101028142209/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41686 "http://www.typophile.com/node/41686")

Not [this very recent one](http://web.archive.org/web/20101028142209/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41686), I suppose?

[edit] Dâ€™oh, laaaate!

Thanks; I did find that one in my search, but that's not the one. I'm pretty sure the photo was in color and taken outdoors, and certain it was a small caps font. I should have bookmarked it.

I liked the font, and wouldn't have thought of using a small cap font for signage.

Good find, Lex. That's it. Thanks!

Since it wasn't a terminal and wasn't an airport, no wonder I couldn't find it. Thank you to all who looked.
